description.p: After selecting this pact boon, you gain access to a small, vaguely humanoid doll. As part of a short or long rest, you may spend an hour meditating to materialize a new one. description.p: When you select this boon, you gain a mask from your patron. The mask cannot be destroyed, and while it is on the same plane as you, you may use your bonus action to call it to you, instantly teleporting it onto your face. If you lose it, you can perform a one hour ritual to summon another one or place the properties of your pact boon onto a mask you already have, keeping its original abilities. While you are wearing the mask, and a humanoid that you can see within 60ft of you is killed, you may use your reaction to steal its visage. While you have this creatures visage, you may use a bonus action to become that creature. While this is active you are physically identical to it, including voice, face, body and clothes. The visage is physical however when you return to your normal form you keep your equipment, additionally when you are in this new form you keep all your original abilities. The visage lasts one hour or until you dispel it. You can do this once per long rest.
